column4: Just installed ubuntu 8.04 on a dell optiplex.  Install was error-free, but grub errors out with "error 5" during the reboot sequence.  Any suggestions?
This error is returned when a read is attempted at a linear block address beyond the end of the BIOS translated area. This generally happens if your disk is larger than the BIOS can handle
it's a 250 Gb hard drive, and a recent dell optiplex 740.
ok, it was the first hit on google
